channel.title: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.
channel.description:
Hello guys.
Maybe I've told you a few times about this project that I'm involved into. It's a project that runs since quite a few years, but lately there's more and more people disappearing. What's more saddening is it once involved a lot of people, but not now.
This project is Might and Magic: Tribute. Basically it's a Tribute game to the Might and Magic series. Maybe some of you guys knows about this series, which is pretty old. If you don't know about it, let me explain it to you. It's a traditional RPG series, involving 4 characters you create, sometimes more. But it's particularity is it's completely open. You can go where you want, anytime you want, a bit [i]àla [/i] Oblivion, except the series existed before the TES series.
What makes is exceptional is the depth of the game. For example, it is said that Might and Magic VI: The Mandate of Heaven which is considered by many like the best game of the series, can take up to [u]300 hours[/u] to complete.
Now, why am I here posting this? It's because MMT needs help. Bad. As I told you before, the team is in pretty bad shape. And they need developers. they need [b]everything[/b]: Modellers, Concept Artists, Sound Engineers, Animators, Programmers, Writers, Mappers, Voice Actors, Janitors, Elfves, name it!
So, I hope you guys will help us! Thank you all.
[i]Edit: Oh I just realized I didn't posted their website. Here it is: [url]https://www.mmtribute.castlegobs.nl/[/url][/i]

item.title: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
About four or five years from now, but it stalled quite a lot of times. Most because of developers quitting/disappearing .

Read full topic

item.source: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.

item.title: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.
item.dc:creator: Right4Dead
item.description:
Unfortionally I don’t fit any of the criteria posted on the site (I’m only good as an enviorment artist, and I never even touched photoshop/Paint shop pro). I also never played a M&M game.
Anyways, good luck to you.

You should put this in the OP
https://www.mmtribute.castlegobs.nl/developers.shtml

Available Positions

We have a continuous demand in the following areas:

C# Programming - experience in C# is mandatory, as well as an affinity for games. Knowledge of XNA is greatly appreciated.

2D Artwork - artistic ability and / or experience of editing existing images and textures in Photoshop / PaintShop Pro etc. are required

3D Modelling - experience with creating low-poly models in applications like 3DSmax, Lightwave, MilkShape3D etc. is required. We are also looking for help in the creation of animations, cutscenes and still renders.

Level Editing - experience from creating levels for other games is helpful.

Sound Engineering - including ambience, voice, and sound effects.

Odd jobs - wiki maintenance, game testing, copyediting, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.

item.title: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.
item.dc:creator: ikiseikel
item.description:
You really won’t understand how much i want to help the project.
I love M&M. Played the heroes 3, 4 and 5 and M&M 7 (A LOT) and 9.
I’ve been playing the games since i was i think 10 years old and still playing them (now 16). So a new might and magic with modern graphics and the classical gameplay would be like heaven for me. But yes the problem is: I am 16 and can’t do anything about it. But i can tell you one thing: if the game would be published instead of being a freeware i would buy it and I won’t be the only one. Because i am not the only one who likes m&m that much…

Read full topic
item.source: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.

item.title: Might and Magic: Tribute needs you.
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Hello guys.

Maybe I’ve told you a few times about this project that I’m involved into. It’s a project that runs since quite a few years, but lately there’s more and more people disappearing. What’s more saddening is it once involved a lot of people, but not now.

This project is Might and Magic: Tribute. Basically it’s a Tribute game to the Might and Magic series. Maybe some of you guys knows about this series, which is pretty old. If you don’t know about it, let me explain it to you. It’s a traditional RPG series, involving 4 characters you create, sometimes more. But it’s particularity is it’s completely open. You can go where you want, anytime you want, a bit àla Oblivion, except the series existed before the TES series.

What makes is exceptional is the depth of the game. For example, it is said that Might and Magic VI: The Mandate of Heaven which is considered by many like the best game of the series, can take up to 300 hours to complete.

Now, why am I here posting this? It’s because MMT needs help. Bad. As I told you before, the team is in pretty bad shape. And they need developers. they need everything: Modellers, Concept Artists, Sound Engineers, Animators, Programmers, Writers, Mappers, Voice Actors, Janitors, Elfves, name it!

So, I hope you guys will help us! Thank you all.

Edit: Oh I just realized I didn’t posted their website. Here it is: https://www.mmtribute.castlegobs.nl/
